columns.text: In this exercise, we will determine what rate Big Dom should report and the effective annual rate of its loans if it has an interest of 27% monthly.

First, Identify at what rate the shop should report.

The rate Big Dom should report is the annual percentage rate. APR, the *Annual Percentage Rate* also referred to as the stated rate, is calculated by multiplying the nominal rate by the number of periods in a year, representing the annual rate a lender can quote its customer as prescribed by laws. Hence we will use the computation of APR to determine the rate it should report.

Let's now determine the stated rate of Dom' shop, considering the interest rate of 27%.

$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{APR} &=12\times0.27
\\[5pt]
&= \boxed{\bf324\%}
\end{aligned}$$

**Therefore based on our calculation, the annual percentage rate or the rate Big Dom should report is 324%.**

Next, determine the effective annual rate.

EAR, otherwise known as *Effective Annual Rate*, refers to a loan's annual interest rate after considering the nominal interest and the compounding period.

The EAR calculation considers the APR and the compounding period of a loan. Hence, we will consider the annual percentage rate we calculated from the previous steps. The EAR can be calculated using the following equation:

$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{EAR} &=\left(1+\dfrac{APR}{m}\right)^m-1
\end{aligned}$$

Where:

$EAR$, which means the effective annual rate\
$APR$, which refers to the annual percentage rate\
$m$, which refers to the compounding period

Let's now calculate the effective annual rate of Dom's loan if it has a 324% annual percentage rate compounded monthly.

$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{EAR} &=\left(1+\dfrac{3.24}{12}\right)^{12}-1
\\[10pt]
 &=\left(1+0.27\right)^{12}-1
\\[5pt]
&= \boxed{\bf{1,660.53\%}}
\end{aligned}$$

**As can be seen in our calculation, the effective annual rate of Big Dom's loan is 1,660.53%.**
To deduce, the rate should Big dom report is represented by the annual percentage rate, which results in 324%, and the effective annual rate of the loan is 1,660.53%.
